amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to promote investment and job growth in United States manufacturing, oil and gas production, and refining sectors through the construction of the Keystone XL Pipeline.

vote.text: Amendment SA 494 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62 - 37. Record Vote Number: 61.

action.text: Amendment SA 494 proposed by Senator Hoeven.
